attributes.action: Lower the voting age to 16 by at least the start of 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 16 & 17 Year Olds can marry, consent to sex, join the army, Drive (17), join higher education institutions, drink alcohol with a meal & many more. Yet they are not allowed to vote for who represents them in adulthood. In 2004, David Milliband stated "it is illogical to prevent 16-year-olds voting when they were allowed to get married and work at that age". 5 years on and there is still no justice for the youth of this country, Mr Brown must push this issue through immediatly as this law discriminates against Britain's youth by saying that they are too immature to decide on issues that matter to them!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
